Item 9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits  
Exhibits are filed herewith in connection with
the Registration Statement on Form S-3(File   
No. 333-236148)filed by Wells Fargo & Company 
(the “Company”) with the Securities and       
Exchange Commission (the “SEC”). On March 24, 
2022, the Company issued its Medium-Term      
Notes, Series U, $4,000,000,000 Senior        
Redeemable Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due    
March 24, 2028 (the “Notes”). The purpose of  
this Current Report is to file with the SEC   
the following documents: (i) the form of Note 
related to the issuance; and (ii) the opinion 
of Faegre Drinker Biddle & Reath LLP regarding
the Notes. (d) Exhibits
